numbered_ace_sentences: 1. There are several sports leagues.
2. Major League Baseball is a sports league.
3. The National Football League is a sports league.
4. In every league except Major League Baseball, players of color are a majority of players.
5. In Major League Baseball, players of color are not a majority of players.
6. In Major League Baseball, 41 percent of players are players of color.
7. There are four graphs.
8. In each of the four graphs, the percentage of players of color is more than 50 percent.
9. In each league, the percentage of coaches of color is small.
10. In each league, the percentage of coaches of color is not more than 50 percent.
11. Major League Baseball is the least diverse league.
12. In the National Football League, the difference between the percentage of players of color and the percentage of coaches of color is the biggest difference.
13. I wonder why there is an obvious difference between the number of players of color and the number of coaches of color.
14. I wonder why the National Football League has low percentages of players of color and coaches of color.
15. Racial bias is a major issue in our country.
16. Racial bias is a major issue around the world.
17. If racial bias occurs in professional sports, then racial bias occurs in other areas.
18. Communities need to come together to fix this issue.
19. This issue has been going on for many years.
20. Some players of color could lack confidence to become a coach.
21. Some players of color could analyze the small percentages of coaches of color.
22. Some coaches in sports leagues are white.
23. The majority of coaches in sports leagues are white.
24. The graph shows a major difference between the number of players of color and the number of coaches of color.
25. The headline is: Play Ball!
26. The headline is also: However, let everyone play ball!
